descriptions: The hair ends in a nicely done ponytail.
The back of her hair is bound into a beautifull ponytail.
A single ponytail flows from the back of her head
Her hair ends in an exotic double ponytail.
The back of her hair is bound into a double ponytail.
Her hair is braided into one long flowing ponytail
Her braided ponytail flows down her back.
Her long hair is braided in one big starburst carroussel that flows all the way down her back.
She wraps her hair into an arround-the-back french braid.
Her hair is shaped into a french braid
Part of her hair is wrapped into an updo dutch braid
The back of her hair is shaped into a gorgeus five-strand backbraid
Her hair ends in a five-strand backbraid
She expertly bound her hair into a five-strand backbraid
A caroussel braid hangs from either side of her head, flowing down her shoulders.
Thick cornrows run along the side of her head
Cornrows run along the side of her head
Cornrows decorate the side of head
Two $haircolor bangs decorate her forehead.
Her hair is parted at the front by two $haircolor bangs.
The front of her hair is braided into a single halobraid
Her head is crowned by a beautifully done halobraid
